item.title: Monopolistic competition
item.description:
Imperfect competition

Or how it is more commonly reffered to - Monopolistic competition. Before it, in economics, there we’re only two absolute of describing competition, perfect Utopian competition and the completely uncompetetive monopoly. Most economics of the time we’re preaching that perfect competition is the only way of handling the market.

Edward Hastings Chamberlin

item.title: [Game] Tricycle Asia
item.description:
Bevy - game engine built in Rust

The rust programming language has an actively growing community around open-source game engine Bevy It’s quite light weight light weight, and you can make both 2d and even 3d games with it. It’s also pretty easy to get started, thanks to its Documentation and Examples Section

Tricycle Asia

While I was traveling Southeast Asia, I eventually reached a point where I had run out of money, but I still had accommodation for month in a senior-retirement coastal City in the south of Vietnam - Nha Trang. Between looking for english-teaching jobs, I suddenly had a lot of time on my hands, so I started learning Rust and developed this small game in Bevy called Tricycle Asia I made my own assets, animations and sound effects. The game is not balanced to be very fair, but I think it has its own charm!

item.title: [Devlog 0.1] Investment Portfolio with Go
item.description:
Investing

For the past few years, I’ve been getting into investing. Modern banking apps make it reasonably easy to get started. In the Baltics, if you have an account with Revolut or Swedbank, you can already invest in publicly traded companies. A good starting point is investing in companies who’s news you already follow for one reason or another. This way, information wise, you’re already ahead of some shmucs who just follows the big trend.

item.title: Tuk, tuk te luis.lu.lv
item.description:
Nāk divdesmit devītais rudenis
Esmu atkal durvju ailē pie Raiņa
Bieži iedvesmots, citreiz izmisis
Sēž man iekšā īri aizmirsis apātis

Nāk ciemos pie apāža gavēnis
Laipnības uzturēšanos laiku pārkāpis

Pats arī diži ilgāk neuzturējies

Durvis neviens nav aizslēdzis
